amendatorysection.catchline: Compulsory attendance; attendance officers; powers and duties; compensation.
amendatorysection.para: School boards shall appoint one or more attendance officers who shall be vested with police powers and shall enforce the provisions of section 79-201 in the school districts for which they act. Attendance officers shall be compensated for their services in such sums as are determined by the school board, to be paid out of the general school fund of the district.

crossreference.para: For provisions for attendance officers reporting illegal employment to Department of Labor and county attorneys, see section 48-312.
